Menace
[i]Striking Dagger[/i] – Whenever Lara, Step Lively becomes tapped, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
[i]Locktouch[/i] – Whenever Lara attacks and isn't blocked, each opponent discards a card.
[i]Blade Dance[/i] – {T}: Up to two other target creatures gain menace until end of turn. Untap them.
